price: Di [¡oh, Mujámmad! esta súplica]: "¡Oh, Señor mío! Si me haces presenciar el castigo que les espera [a los que se niegan a creer],
arabic: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّي مَا يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qul rabbi immā turiyannī mā yūʿadūna
